meanings.sent1: The tsareviches played in the royal gardens.
meanings.sent2: The tsareviches inherited the throne after their father.
meanings.sent3: The tsareviches tried to sneak past the palace guards for fun.
meanings.sent4: The tsareviches were the jewels in the crown of the royal family.
meanings.sent5: The tsareviches' laughter echoed through the palace halls.

meanings.sent1: The museum displayed portraits of the tsareviches.
meanings.sent2: The tsareviches were known for their bravery in battle.
meanings.sent3: At the costume party, everyone dressed up as tsareviches.
meanings.sent4: The tsareviches stood out like shining stars in the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The tsareviches' portraits hung proudly in the grand hall.
